name: UChicago Decentralized #0: Kaesha Freyaldenhoven
description: Kaesha is currently pursing a law degree at Berkeley Law and is the Chief of Staff at 2 Punks Capital. She is also very familiar with the NFT space!
extraDescription: UChicago Decentralized is a interview-style speaker series intended to make the blockchain space more accessible to UChicago students via information and connections.

name: UChicago Decentralized #1: Mitch Mechigian
description: Mitch Mechigian is the Chief of Staff at Blockchain Coinvestors & Fifth Era.
extraDescription: UChicago Decentralized is a interview-style speaker series intended to make the blockchain space more accessible to UChicago students via information and connections.
